segments.text: What's that , a new video game ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nope ! It's the latest generation of PAD ! You won't believe what it can do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It has a built-in camera unit that takes digital color stills . It also plays MP3 files , which I can save on media cards and then transfer to the hard drive of my computer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This one comes with its own folding keyboard . It has a pre-installed handwriting recognition program . I can use the stylus to write on the screen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What if I want to use CD-ROMs or floppies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just plug in a peripheral CD or floppy drive and you're ready to go !
segments.speaker: S2
